item.description:
Fri 6:30 PM Location
Manchester Community College
60 Bidwell St
*Band Shell*
Manchester, CT 06040

How to find us
"Look For the "6 foot Orange Pole" & "Slow Adults at Play" sign on the outer border."


http://www.manchester....

Rain cancels the event for us but as usual, i will be watching the weather and will cancel if it looks doomed for us.. but you can make your own choice too.

with plenty of parking
We will be on the outer border ( not exactly sure sure where yet, depends on people density and view angles..etc) so as to allow conversation and not interfere with other concert goers, LOOK for the "ORANGE 6 FOOT POLE" and "SLOW adults at play sign" in our area.

Bring your food, bug spray, BUGG JUICE (AKA alchohol or healthy drink) of choice
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Getting there:

60 Bidwell Street
Manchester, CT 06040
(on the campus of Manchester Community College)

From Interstate 84 East (West Hartford, Waterbury):

Take 84 East to Exit 59 (I-384 Providence)
Go to Exit 1 (Silver Lane/Spencer Street)
At the end of the exit, make a left onto Spencer Street.
At the 4th light, go right onto Hartford Road.
At the blinking yellow light, go right onto Bidwell Street.
Just after you go under the highway, make the first right into the Manchester Community College campus.
Go straight until you see the Band Shell on the left.

From Interstate 84 West (Stafford Springs, Eastern Mass):

Take 84 West to Exit 59 (I-384/Spencer Street)
Get in the right lane to go to Exit 1 (Silver Lane/Spencer Street)
At the end of the exit, make a left onto Spencer Street.
At the 4th light, go right onto Hartford Road.
At the blinking yellow light, go right onto Bidwell Street.
Just after you go under the highway, make the first right into the Manchester Community College campus.
Go straight until you see the Band Shell on the left.

From Interstate 91 North (Middletown, New Haven):

Take 91 North to Exit 29 (East Hartford/Boston)
Stay on Route 5/15 until it feeds into 84.
Once on 84 East, move to the right lanes to get to Exit 59 (I-384 Providence).
Go to Exit 1 (Silver Lane/Spencer Street)
At the end of the exit, make a left onto Spencer Street.
At the 4th light, go right onto Hartford Road.
At the blinking yellow light, go right onto Bidwell Street.
Just after you go under the highway, make the first right into the Manchester Community College campus.
Go straight until you see the Band Shell on the left.

From Interstate 91 South (Windsor, Springfield):

Take 91 South to Exit 30 (East Hartford/New London)
Take 84 East to Exit 59 (I-384 Providence)
Go to Exit 1 (Silver Lane/Spencer Street)
At the end of the exit, make a left onto Spencer Street.
At the 4th light, go right onto Hartford Road.
At the blinking yellow light, go right onto Bidwell Street.
Just after you go under the highway, make the first right into the Manchester Community College campus.
Go straight until you see the Band Shell on the left

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Neil Diamond concert
